hero.description: Every Hall-of-Fame investor is obsessed with the question of how best to diversify to maximize returns and minimize risks.
hero.title: Ready to diversify?
products.awp++.description: Diversify like Ray Dalio with a portfolio that keeps you safe in all weather. Bonus: with crypto assets.
products.btc++.description: Diversify your Bitcoin positions among different representations of BTC (imBTC, pBTC, sBTC & wBTC)
products.title: Choose the right diversification strategy for you
products.usd++.description: Diversify your USD position among different representations of USD, such as DAI, USDC, USDT, etc.
tldr.description: BTC++ is a weighed allocation between the different representations of Bitcoin on Ethereum. Bitcoin, for DeFi, diversified.
